name: Google Mail Old Look for LM
description: Recreation of Google Mail old style custom look as best as possible.  Color scheme is grey, black and purple.
additional_info:
Recommended that you set your Theme to Soft Gray while using this.
Incorporates settings ideas from Gmail - Change Button Icons to Text  ( http://userstyles.org/styles/57677/gmail-change-button-icons-to-text ) to make the buttons easier to work with.  A few settings ideas were inspired by The Return of Old Gmail ( http://userstyles.org/styles/57755/the-return-of-old-gmail ).  Also got some scroll bar ideas from New Gmail - Visible Scroll Bar ( http://userstyles.org/styles/55734/new-gmail-visible-scroll-bar ).  Most of it was from experimenting with Firebug in Firefox and testing out on Chrome.
Other Google Mail Tips available at http://www.distasis.com/cpp/gmail.htm
